info.title: Get SEC Filings Data
info.description: Fetches the latest 10-Q filings for a company. Uses CIK resolution, alias mapping, and GitHub-based alias updates. Returns up to the most recent 10-Q HTML reports, with optional control over how many filings to retrieve.

get.description: Returns the most recent 10-Q filings for a public company, including filing dates and validated HTML report links. Defaults to 4 filings unless 'count' query param is specified (max recommended: 8; internal cap: 10).

parameters.name: company_name
parameters.description: Public company name or ticker (e.g., Apple, AAPL, Meta, RH).

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Optional. Number of most recent 10-Q filings to return (default is 4, max is 8, internal hard cap is 10).

Matched Company Name.description: Resolved company name using alias and fuzzy matching.

CIK.description: SEC Central Index Key for the matched company.

10-Q Filings.description: A list of the latest 10-Q reports with filing dates and HTML URLs.

HTML Report.description: Validated URL to the HTML version of the 10-Q report.

404.description: Company not found or no filings available
